articles.title: Airbus-built European robotic arm ready for space - Asian Aviation
articles.description: Airbus space engineers have installed ESA’s European Robotic Arm (ERA) on to the Russian Multipurpose Laboratory Module (MLM) and it is now ready for its flight to the International Space Station (ISS).

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Asian stocks stumble on China tech worries - The Star Online
articles.description: TOKYO: Asian stocks were mixed on Monday amid growing worries about China's crackdown on local tech companies, paring earlier gains made after a welcome U.S. jobs report drove global shares to a record high.
